page.title: 14Local News. 19_26 June,1985.
page.content: A young pilot from Prestwick's {H.M.S. Gannet}was killed and his co_pilot seriously injured when their Sea King helicopter crashed in Fife whilst taking part in a N.A.T.O. exercise. The cause of the crash will not be made known till an M.O.D. and Aircraft Accident Investigation Unit complete their in enquiries. The{District Council}has criticised the decision of the Secretary of State to overturn their refusal of planning permission for private sheltered housing at Barns Park. Provost MacDonald said too many houses were planned resulting in a lack of open space and insufficient car parking facilities.
